citations.narrative:
Item Space Requirements 3.128
At the time of inspection the goat exhibit had 12 goats, the shelter provided for the animals were 3 plastic shelters
which it appears is not sufficient shelter for the 12 animals.
Facility needs to insure there is adequate shelter space for all animals.
Correct by close of business 5/20/15
Exit interview took place at the end of inspection
